title: Pioneers of Energy Medicine Continues Shiva Lord of Destruction
text:
(MENAFN Press) Ledgewood NJ (PR Buzz) October 14 2015--- QuWave's biopics on the founding fathers of energy medicine continues with a more ancient twist: this month's article is on .
Shiva is one of the three main gods of the Hindu pantheon. In Hinduism Brahma represents the principle of creation Vishnu represents the principle of preservation and Shiva represents the principle of destruction.
In celebration of Shiva and Halloween at the end of the month QuWave is offering . Enter the code "SHIVA15" at checkout and click "update cart" to get the discount. The usually 297 will be 148 for the duration of the sale. 
QuWave is also offering a new Divine eBook for free. The eBook includes an explanation of the chakras meditation techniques ways to open your third eye and more.
The QuWave Divine sends out frequencies that increase the rate at which spiritual and paranormal experiences occur. Uses for the Divine include enhancing prayer meditation and other spiritual pursuits. One use specifically for Halloween includes using the Divine with a Ouija board to communicate with spirits. 
Pioneers of Energy Medicine is an ongoing series QuWave is syndicating. In the past it has featured visionaries such as Nikola Tesla Wilhelm Reich and Royal Raymond Rife.
The Pioneers of Energy Medicine page can be found under the "Research" tab on QuWave's site or at this link: 
About QuWave:
QuWave LLC a prominent organization in the energy medicine field manufacturing unique and active products that block the negative effects of EMF pollution and radiation while also generating Scalar Waves Solfeggio Frequencies Schumann Resonance and Chi Orgone energies to promote a healthy balanced lifestyle.  QuWave is an online company located in Ledgewood NJ that has customers affiliates and resellers around the world. For more information on QuWave visit www.QuWave.com
